      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        PayloadStdAttributes
        The standard attributes that appear on the root element for all OpenTravel messages.
        Details
        Type PayloadStdAttributes
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        POS
        Point of Sale (POS) identifies the party or connection channel making the request.
        Details
        Type POS
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        ProcessingInfo
        Transaction processing directives, including display currency overrides. If no display currency information is provided, the display and pricing currency will default to the value in POS/Source/@ISOCurrency.
        Details
        Type ProcessingInfo
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        FacilityQueryHotel
        Search criteria for finding hotels.
        Details
        Type Facility_Query_Hotel
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
